news_header: Everton football club's front-of-shirt sponsor, Stake, is relinquishing its license in Great Britain following an investigation into an advertisement featuring porn actress Bonnie Blue.
news_original_title: Everton sponsor leaves UK after porn ad probe
news_text: The ad, which appeared on social media, prompted concerns about using sexual content to promote gambling to young people. The Gambling Commission is warning Everton and other clubs about their responsibilities regarding unlicensed gambling websites. Stake will cease operations in Great Britain on March 11, focusing instead on securing local licenses. Premier League clubs will stop using gambling companies as main sponsors by the end of the 2025-26 season, amid increasing scrutiny of gambling sponsorships in football.
